tokens.resolved_gloss: familiar; a friend, also gentle; hence, a bullock (as being tame; applied, although masculine, to a cow); and so, a chieftain (as notable, like neat cattle)
tokens.translation: familiar; a friend, also gentle; hence, a bullock (as being tame; applied, although masculine, to a cow); and so, a chieftain (as notable, like neat cattle)

tokens.resolved_gloss: Edom, the elder twin-brother of Jacob; hence the region (Idumaea) occupied by him
